S.FORM: == Law-ce老子 == nikaudipan生平 caay ka tinengi ku niyadu'故里之辯 caay ka tineng ku pilecuhan ni Law-ce, i cudad inai' ku katinengan nu pilecuhan ni Law-ce, uydasa ni Se-ma-cin a ni sulitan, Cu u sumamaday a Cu-kuo, Ku-sin aydaay nu Lu-yi-sin, Li-niyadu' u Sin-cen-tun a Tay-cin-kun niyadu', Cei-ze-li aydaay nu Cin-cen-hu kitidaan - Tay-cin-kun-cen. 44 Law-ce" nu ayawan linpic cay mihcaan- nu ayawan sippic cay mihcaan", pilecuhan i Tun-cuo a Cu-kuo Ku-sin Li-sen-ceu-zei-li. cun-cen-ciw se-sing-cia, mueneng i Sye-tay-kun-yen-san. 老子前(571年—前471年), . palitaen ni Kun-ce 孔子問道 nikudan kainai' en tu nu Tun-cuo wan-se, tatengan idaw kina ci Cuo-tin-ce, cilaw ku yadahay nu niyadu'an, mangalay namin malatahudan, ci Li-pen-le-hay matulin tu tusa a lasubu nu pina a mihcaan. ci Cuo-sing-wan sabaw tu pitu mihcaan, sikawaw tu " ce-tay-ce-lun", bahbahan patayda i sawacan, hatidaay tu nu cudadan maalaw patayda i Cu-kuo a Kuo-du, ales han ci Law-ce. samuhmuh satu ci Law-ce, malalacal sa aci Kun-ce. . Law-ce老子 saan, tawya mala sakakaay ci Law-ce caay kalesem makaadih tu Cuo-caw mademec, tawya miculimek namakayda i Ku-kun a tahekal nu ayawan, tawya maadih tu sakakaay ci " Kung-lin", katayni palabang han, mangalay papisakamu ci Cuo-lian. Idawya ci Li-zan sakamusa, tuci Yi-si-taw, " idaw ku cudad ni Law-ce tu " taw-de-cin", malatusa, pabaay a cudad u "taw-de", tada i hekal ku kamu, pasu nikasumad nu cancanan, palutatengan ku di'di'tusa, sasaay nu cudadan u " de-cin" sakay tademaw kuyda, hican taayaw tadikud a kamuan, kya matenens ku hican misuayaw tu tademaw sa. caay ka hedek ku nipinanaman, mangelu' minanam, sadikuday idaw ku laheci." uyni sat uku liwan, kacaw satu katalan mulaliw. 相傳, . tina kungkuan, ci Yi-si i pasayda i lala' sakamusa, maadih ku walian salungan ku demiad, takelal sa, mahicaay kiya ku demiad, tanunamuh sa, tabaki ku ngiha " namaka walian ku kapah nu demiad, idaw ku caayay kalecad nu tademaw makayda". katuud ku tademaw nai' ku lawad miasik, mihalhal tu nikatayni nu tademaw, i Ku-kun nu panapananan ni sulitan tu hudi saan " ce-ci-tun-lay" sepat kina tabakiay ni sulitan, katukuh ayda, sisa sumamad u " ce-ci-tun-lay-han-ku-kan, lima a malebut ku cud ani Law-ce". ". udip a nidatengan 個人思想 ci Law-ce u milingatuay misulit tu taw-cia a tademaw, sakaudip pakunida sananay, kasikadan ku kamu, hatedep han, acaay kacacinlaw atu taw. sakay cen-ce hamin han pasu adidiay nu tademawan a mikuwan, idaw ku cacayay nu kamu ni Law-ce, " matineng ku pabaway, anu idaw ku la'cusay hida hantu, anu mahica ku kamu nu taw, hidan tu sa.", anu mangalay ku binawlan, sayadahen ku nipadawsu sa, anu mapatay ku binawlan, miyukiw kita tu siidaay nu tademaw, caay ka patay ku binawla, uyca ka talawan mapatay sa." ." kapatayan去世 Law-ce hedek nu mihcaan itida i Di-taw-hu mapatay. nikapatayan ni Law-ce a siwmian. . mala bunsan ci Law-cean sa老子化胡說 idaw ku sananay caay henay ka patay ci Law-ce sa, katukuh i Si-yi, pasakamuen ku Si-yi a tademaw, uyni u kamusa " Law-ce-hua-hu". Law-ce-hua-hu inakamu namaka Tun-han, han-hen-ti-yen-si siwa mihcaan " caylimlim mihcaan" ida i cuda nu sing-cea " idaw ku sananay ci Law-cean tayda i Yi-di malabunsan" a sasakamuen. "的說法. daw-ciw atu tay-sang-law-cun道教和太上老君 daw-ciw taneng talaayaw taydan nu sumamad nu syakay Cuo-kuo tademaw a kawawan, nikudan haymawsa idaw tu ku sin-daw, hun-law-daw nu dadatengan, sisa, ci Law-ce u daw-cu han nu tademaw. sa u daw-ciw nu disi saan, ci Law-ce u tay-cen nu di'tuan. An-hua-wo-yen a Law-ce nakamuan itida i Wo-yen dadaydaysa, u kamu sa ku dadaydayan, bangcal ku kamu, idaw ku talakaway a nikinkiwan nu'puc a cudadan, malatusa kina kawaw, sayaway namakawawa katukuh tu balaki a nikaudipan, sakatusa sakay ci Law-ce atu ten-cin-kun a nakamuan. ina Wo-yen ten-cin-kun tataydaan midang atu Kan-aw a binacadan mapulung mihedek a masanga. mahiniay a Law-ce anunamakapina tu nu malebut a mihcaan nu kakakunkuan atu nidaydayan nu kakungkuan, matineng ku paylumaluma' ay nu tademawan, malenec tu a mitengil. . Law-cun-yun ba'tu老君岩 itida i Ci-iun buyu idaw ku mahida u tademaw a tabakiay nu ba'tuan mahida nipituktukan a cun-ciw zitay midatengay nu lumaan ci Law-ce a sasing, pangangan han Law-cun-yun ba'tu. Law-cun-yun ba'tu patideng i Sung-yun a zitayan, u Cung-kuo ayda satabakiay a Sun-tay daw-ciw a ba'tu nu sasingan, u Cin-yun buyu tataydaan midang, bangcal ku nituktukan, malalikisi atu nalimaan a epucan.

== Law-ce老子 == nikaodipan生平 caay ka tinengi ko niyado'故里之辯 caay ka tineng ko pilecohan ni Law-ce, i codad inai' ko katinengan no pilecohan ni Law-ce, oydasa ni Se-ma-cin a ni solitan, Co o somamaday a Co-koo, Ko-sin aydaay no Lo-yi-sin, Li-niyado' o Sin-cen-ton a Tay-cin-kon niyado', Cei-ze-li aydaay no Cin-cen-ho kitidaan - Tay-cin-kon-cen. 44 Law-ce" no ayawan linpic cay mihcaan- no ayawan sippic cay mihcaan", pilecohan i Ton-coo a Co-koo Ko-sin Li-sen-ceo-zei-li. con-cen-ciw se-sing-cia, moeneng i Sye-tay-kon-yen-san. 老子前(571年—前471年), . palitaen ni Kon-ce 孔子問道 nikodan kainai' en to no Ton-coo wan-se, tatengan idaw kina ci Coo-tin-ce, cilaw ko yadahay no niyado'an, mangalay namin malatahodan, ci Li-pen-le-hay matolin to tosa a lasobo no pina a mihcaan. ci Coo-sing-wan sabaw to pito mihcaan, sikawaw to " ce-tay-ce-lon", bahbahan patayda i sawacan, hatidaay to no codadan maalaw patayda i Co-koo a Koo-do, ales han ci Law-ce. samohmoh sato ci Law-ce, malalacal sa aci Kon-ce. . Law-ce老子 saan, tawya mala sakakaay ci Law-ce caay kalesem makaadih to Coo-caw mademec, tawya micolimek namakayda i Ko-kon a tahekal no ayawan, tawya maadih to sakakaay ci " Kong-lin", katayni palabang han, mangalay papisakamo ci Coo-lian. Idawya ci Li-zan sakamosa, toci Yi-si-taw, " idaw ko codad ni Law-ce to " taw-de-cin", malatosa, pabaay a codad o "taw-de", tada i hekal ko kamo, paso nikasomad no cancanan, palotatengan ko di'di'tosa, sasaay no codadan o " de-cin" sakay tademaw koyda, hican taayaw tadikod a kamoan, kya matenens ko hican misoayaw to tademaw sa. caay ka hedek ko nipinanaman, mangelo' minanam, sadikoday idaw ko laheci." oyni sat oko liwan, kacaw sato katalan molaliw. 相傳, . tina kongkoan, ci Yi-si i pasayda i lala' sakamosa, maadih ko walian salongan ko demiad, takelal sa, mahicaay kiya ko demiad, tanonamoh sa, tabaki ko ngiha " namaka walian ko kapah no demiad, idaw ko caayay kalecad no tademaw makayda". katood ko tademaw nai' ko lawad miasik, mihalhal to nikatayni no tademaw, i Ko-kon no panapananan ni solitan to hodi saan " ce-ci-ton-lay" sepat kina tabakiay ni solitan, katokoh ayda, sisa somamad o " ce-ci-ton-lay-han-ko-kan, lima a malebot ko cod ani Law-ce". ". odip a nidatengan 個人思想 ci Law-ce o milingatoay misolit to taw-cia a tademaw, sakaodip pakonida sananay, kasikadan ko kamo, hatedep han, acaay kacacinlaw ato taw. sakay cen-ce hamin han paso adidiay no tademawan a mikowan, idaw ko cacayay no kamo ni Law-ce, " matineng ko pabaway, ano idaw ko la'cosay hida hanto, ano mahica ko kamo no taw, hidan to sa.", ano mangalay ko binawlan, sayadahen ko nipadawso sa, ano mapatay ko binawlan, miyokiw kita to siidaay no tademaw, caay ka patay ko binawla, oyca ka talawan mapatay sa." ." kapatayan去世 Law-ce hedek no mihcaan itida i Di-taw-ho mapatay. nikapatayan ni Law-ce a siwmian. . mala bonsan ci Law-cean sa老子化胡說 idaw ko sananay caay henay ka patay ci Law-ce sa, katokoh i Si-yi, pasakamoen ko Si-yi a tademaw, oyni o kamosa " Law-ce-hoa-ho". Law-ce-hoa-ho inakamo namaka Ton-han, han-hen-ti-yen-si siwa mihcaan " caylimlim mihcaan" ida i coda no sing-cea " idaw ko sananay ci Law-cean tayda i Yi-di malabonsan" a sasakamoen. "的說法. daw-ciw ato tay-sang-law-con道教和太上老君 daw-ciw taneng talaayaw taydan no somamad no syakay Coo-koo tademaw a kawawan, nikodan haymawsa idaw to ko sin-daw, hon-law-daw no dadatengan, sisa, ci Law-ce o daw-co han no tademaw. sa o daw-ciw no disi saan, ci Law-ce o tay-cen no di'toan. An-hoa-wo-yen a Law-ce nakamoan itida i Wo-yen dadaydaysa, o kamo sa ko dadaydayan, bangcal ko kamo, idaw ko talakaway a nikinkiwan no'poc a codadan, malatosa kina kawaw, sayaway namakawawa katokoh to balaki a nikaodipan, sakatosa sakay ci Law-ce ato ten-cin-kon a nakamoan. ina Wo-yen ten-cin-kon tataydaan midang ato Kan-aw a binacadan mapolong mihedek a masanga. mahiniay a Law-ce anonamakapina to no malebot a mihcaan no kakakonkoan ato nidaydayan no kakongkoan, matineng ko paylomaloma' ay no tademawan, malenec to a mitengil. . Law-con-yon ba'to老君岩 itida i Ci-ion boyo idaw ko mahida o tademaw a tabakiay no ba'toan mahida nipitoktokan a con-ciw zitay midatengay no lomaan ci Law-ce a sasing, pangangan han Law-con-yon ba'to. Law-con-yon ba'to patideng i Song-yon a zitayan, o Cong-koo ayda satabakiay a Son-tay daw-ciw a ba'to no sasingan, o Cin-yon boyo tataydaan midang, bangcal ko nitoktokan, malalikisi ato nalimaan a epocan.
